text: is a Japanese manga artist and writer.Contemporary Art Gallery at Art Tower Mito (ATM), Participating Artists and Exhibited Works, Kyoko Okazaki ; retrieved 2012-1-20. ==Select works== Her work includes * Pink (1989) * River's Edge (1994) * Helter Skelter (2003) ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Tokyo
